package practices6;

import java.net.InetAddress;
import java.net.UnknownHostException;

public class Net {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		try {
			InetAddress ip = InetAddress.getByName("engg.dypvp.edu.in");
			
			System.out.println("host name  " + ip.getHostName());
			System.out.println("host addresss  "  + ip.getCanonicalHostName());
			
			
			//print local host 
			InetAddress address1 = InetAddress.getLocalHost();
			System.out.println("local host  " + address1);
			
			//inet addesss of named host 
			InetAddress address2 = InetAddress.getByName("10.30.70.61");
			System.out.println("inet address named host  " + address2);
			
			
			//all inet addesss of named host 
		
			
			
		} catch (UnknownHostException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

	}

}
